html:
539 U.S. 974

Frew, on Behalf of Her Daughter, Frew, et al.
v.
Hawkins, Commissioner, Texas Health and Human Services Commission, et al.

No. 02-628.

Supreme Court of United States.

August 4, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 538 U. S. 905.]

2

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
